name: snippetsurfer
title: Snippet Surfer
description: SnippetSurfer is a Raycast extension designed to swiftly navigate through snippets of information. You can effortlessly skim through text excerpts, code snippets, or any other brief segments of content and copy them to the clipboard. The snippets are read from a folder of markdown or yaml files.
author: astronight

preferences.name: folderPath
preferences.description: Select the primary folder where snippets are located.
preferences.title: Primary Snippet Folder (required)

preferences.name: secondaryFolderPaths
preferences.description: Comma separated list of additional paths where snippets are located. Example: ~/Desktop/snippets,~/Documents/othersnippets
preferences.title: Secondary Snippet Folders (comma-separated, optional)

preferences.name: primaryAction
preferences.description: Choose the default action when selecting a snippet: copy to clipboard or paste directly to the active app.
preferences.title: Primary Action (copy, paste, or both)

preferences.name: searchIndexLines
preferences.description: Number of lines from the beginning of each file to index for search (1-50).
preferences.title: Lines to Index for Search (1-50, default 3)

preferences.name: supportedExtensions
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of file extensions to scan for snippets (without dots). IMPORTANT: The order determines search result priority - extensions listed first will appear higher in search results.
preferences.title: File Extensions (order affects search priority)
